name: cut_ds
label: Cut DS
description: The implementation cuts one DATASET along time axis: keep only the points situated in specified time interval. This implementation saves the resulting TS, and returns references.

inputs.name: ds_name
inputs.label: DSname
inputs.description: The name of the dataset where SAX is applied

parameters.name: sd
parameters.description: Start date (millisec): optional: if missing, ikats_start_date metadata is used as default value
parameters.label: Start date

parameters.name: ed
parameters.description: End date (millisec): optional: if missing, ikats_end_date metadata is used as default value
parameters.label: End date

parameters.name: nb_points
parameters.description: Optional: maximum number of points retained by the time cut.
parameters.label: Number of points

outputs.name: result
outputs.label: TS list
outputs.description: The list of TSUIDs/FuncId cutted in a time interval.
